title: Zoey Deutch stuns in bright orange outfit while heading inside the Today Show
text:
Zoey Deutch wasted no time to serve a major look while heading inside for the Today Show on Thursday morning.

The 24-year-old Politician star wore a bright orange get-up while heading inside the studios to discuss her Netflix original series co-starring Gwyneth Paltrow.

She also opened up about her 'bazaar obsession' with her pitbull Maybelle revealing that she has a tattoo of her dog on her leg.

Early morning: Zoey Deutch wore a bright orange get-up while heading inside the studios to discuss her Netflix original series

She wore her short red hair sleek and short as she stepped inside on the rainy day in New York.

Her bold blazer was button in the middle with a poofy shoulder and tailored at her waist.

The matching pants were extremely flowly and almost resembled a skirt as she headed inside.

Details: The matching pants were extremely flowly and almost resembled a skirt as she headed inside

Stunning: The legs of the pants had a high slit in it to show off her toned legs and a nude high heel for this bright and elegant look

While on the show, she revealed that because it was a Ryan Murphy creation that typically means that the role includes singing - and that it did.

And on that first day where it was time to show what she's got, she revealed she got laryngitis.

But she sang through it and she said that 'it was really fun to sing' on the series and even admitted she kept it a secret while on set.

Girl's best friend: Also during the interview, she revealed that she has her dog - a pitbull - tattooed onto her body

Good morning chat: She said down with the Today co-stars and also talked Zombieland 2

Also during the interview, she revealed that she has her dog - a pitbull - tattooed onto her body.

She went on to show the tattoo on her leg and called it a 'bazaar obsession' with her young dog.

Just days before, the star also took to her Instagram to share photos of her four-legged friend Maybelle calling her personal Instagram a #stanaccount for her dog.
description:
Zoey Deutch wasted no time to serve a major look while heading inside for the Today Show on Thursday morning.
The 24-year-old Politician star wore a bright orange get-up.
